name: Scholar of Candles
desc: Increases Character's CRIT DMG by 50%. When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to 100% of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for 1 turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and the team can trigger this effect 3 time(s) at most. Before the triggers are completely consumed, increase characters' CRIT DMG by 50%.
